title: Game randomly loose connection
body:
So I recently reinstalled LoL, and I already have an issue. In almost every game I lose connection with the game but only in the game (my friends can still hear me on discord). I don't have any weird lag or anything and my connection is fine until I lose the connection to the game. It's really annoying because it's totally random and I need to quit and reconnect from the game to be able to play again. I have this issue on LoL only. 

Please halp me Riot :(

replies.body: Your network is probably having a few problems keeping it's connection with our servers for some reason. You may see some improvements with a hardwired connection, but let's also go through and check for any [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) you might be able to update.

Sounds like packet loss, theres a couple guides riots put out on this and ways you can send them some info to try and remedy it.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
